Package com.intellij.openapi.util

Class IconLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intellij.openapi.util.IconLoader

  • public final class IconLoader
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides access to icons used in the UI.

    Please see Working with Icons and Images about supported formats, organization, and accessing icons in plugins.

    See Also:
    IconUtil

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes

      static class  IconLoader.CachedImageIcon 
      static class  IconLoader.LazyIcon
      Consider using #createLazy).

        For internal usage. Converts the icon to 1x scale when applicable.

      • getDarkIcon

        public static javax.swing.Icon getDarkIcon(javax.swing.Icon icon,
                                           boolean dark)
        Returns a copy of the provided icon with darkness set to dark. The method takes effect on a IconLoader.CachedImageIcon (or its wrapper) only.
